charges.charge_name: Conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug

offence_date.source: on an unknown date between December 2022 and the 27th day of December 2022

place_of_offence.address: Room 606D, Block B, Yau Tong Industrial City in Kwun Tong
place_of_offence.source: at about 1.20 am on 27 December 2022, the police arrived at Room 606D, Block B, Yau Tong Industrial City in Kwun Tong

cross_border.source: No cross-border activities mentioned in the transcript

trafficking_mode.source: he was only a cog in the machine and played a very small role... his role was more like a courier taking the drug from the Lei Yue Mun Plaza back to the room.

reasons_for_offence.source: Because the 1st defendant was indebted so he agreed. ... he owed debts in the region of $300,000. Counsel said he committed the present offence to earn quick money.

trafficking_mode.source: he had rented the room and did not lock it, apparently for the purpose of allowing others to use it whenever they wanted. He also hired the room for a period of 2 years, apparently on behalf of the drug trafficking syndicate.
